front.title: IPsec Security Policy Database Configuration MIB

abstract.t: This document defines an SMIv2 Management Information Base (MIB) module for configuring the security policy database of a device implementing the IPsec protocol. The policy-based packet filtering and the corresponding execution of actions described in this document are of a more general nature than for IPsec configuration alone, such as for configuration of a firewall. This MIB module is designed to be extensible with other enterprise or standards based defined packet filters and actions.
